main.confirmDeleteSnippet: Are you sure you want to delete this snippet?
main.errorLoadingFile: There was an error loading the file.
main.errorFileTooLarge: This file is too large to open with RunJS.
main.saveErrorContent: There was an error saving the file
main.pasteErrorContent: Data is too large for RunJS to handle.
main.errorInvalidLicense: Error: Activation failed due to invalid license key.
main.errorLicenseNotFound: Error: Failed to find license information. Please try again later.
main.errorTwoMachinesActive:
Error: Activation limit has been reached. You can deactivate devices online at
runjs.app/license-manager
main.errorDeactivationFailed: Error: Deactivation failed. Please contact mail@runjs.app for assistance.
main.errorConnectionProblem: Error: There was a problem connecting to the server.
main.errorFirewall: Error: Request was blocked. Please whitelist license.haaslabs.app
main.updateNow: Found updates, do you want update now?
main.newVersionAvailable: A new version of RunJS is available.
main.downloadFrom: RunJS can be downloaded from the official website or you can use your preferred package manager.
main.updatesDownloaded: Updates downloaded, application will be quit for update...
main.copyright:
Created by Luke Haas

main.confirmCloseTab: Are you sure you want to close this tab?
main.saveChanges: Do you want to save your changes?
main.lostChanges: Your changes will be lost if you don't save them.
main.afterUpdatePeriod: This version of RunJS was released after your update period ended.
main.renewOrDowngrade: Please renew your license or revert to version {{name}}.
main.updateReady: A new update is ready to install
main.updateReadyDetail: RunJS version {version} has been downloaded and is ready to be installed
main.considerPurchasing: If you find RunJS helpful, please consider supporting its continued development by purchasing a license.
main.curentTabUnresponsive: The current tab has become unresponsive.

common.openAiNoApiKey:
To use this feature, please enter your OpenAI API key in the settings.

To find out how to get an OpenAI API key, please refer to the OpenAI documentation: https://platform.openai.com/docs/quickstart
common.geminiNoApiKey:
To use this feature, please enter your Gemini API key in the settings.

To find out how to get a Gemini API key, please refer to the Gemini documentation: https://ai.google.dev/gemini-api/docs/api-key
common.mistralNoApiKey:
To use this feature, please enter your Mistral AI API key in the settings.

To find out how to get an Mistral AI API key, please refer to the Mistral AI documentation: https://docs.mistral.ai/getting-started/quickstart/
common.anthropicNoApiKey:
To use this feature, please enter your Anthropic API key in the settings.

To find out how to get an Anthropic API key, please refer to the Anthropic documentation: https://docs.claude.com/en/api/overview

editor.activatePremiumFeatures: Activate RunJS and get full access to all features
editor.pleaseRenew: It's time to renew - Please renew your license to keep receiving updates.
editor.npmPackagesDetail: Experiment with new libraries and frameworks
editor.autocompleteDetail: See code suggestions while you type
editor.typeCheckingDetail: See type related errors and warnings
editor.extraThemesDetail: Ayu, One Dark, Shades of Purple, SynthWave '84
editor.magicCommentsDetail: See the value of any expression anywhere in your code
editor.hoverInfoDetail: See information, including documentation, when hovering over code
editor.activateForMagicComments: Activate RunJS to enable this feature

preferences.matchLinesHint: Output results will be placed on the same line as their source. Disable this to show output results in their natural order of execution.
preferences.tabBarDescription: Show tab bar for single tab
preferences.runtimeValuesDescription: Show the result of each top-level expression
preferences.useTabsDescription: Indent lines with tabs instead of spaces
preferences.semicolonsDescription: Print semicolons at the ends of statements
preferences.singleQuotesDescription: Use single quotes instead of double quotes
preferences.jsxQuotesDescription: Use single quotes instead of double quotes in JSX
preferences.bracketSpacingDescription: Print spaces between brackets in object literals
preferences.changeAfterRestart: Changes will be applied after restarting the app.
preferences.topLevelAwaitHint: Top-level await is not compatible with expression results.
preferences.npmrcHint: .npmrc stores settings that control how NPM operates when managing packages and dependencies.
preferences.npmrcFailedToRead: Failed to read .npmrc file. Please check permissions.
preferences.npmrcTooLarge: The .npmrc file is too large. Please reduce its size.
preferences.npmrcFailedToSave: Failed to save .npmrc file. Please check permissions.

license.deactivateYourLicense: Here you can deactivate your RunJS license if you want to use it on a different computer.
license.activateYourLicense: Your copy of RunJS is not activated yet. Please enter your license key below.
license.licenseHint: You should find your license key in the confirmation email you received after purchasing RunJS.

vars.noVars:
No environment variables yet.
Use the form above to add environment variables.
vars.hint: Environment variables are loaded into process.env and accessed by suffixing the key of the environment variable.

installer.initError: An error occured that prevented NPM from initializing.

installer.removeError: An error occured while removing package
